title: A Chinese live in China,hello everyone
txt_content:
Hello,everyone ,I'm from China.I'm very happy I can know MCBBS in internet.
  There is very GOOD,I like stay there.
  In MCBBS,I think have so much talents in there，There‘s pepole talking so pleasent to hear
  I like live there.
  纯属娱乐，并无他意。

大家好，我来自中国。我很高兴能在网上认识MCBBS。
那里很好，我喜欢呆在那里。
在麦克布斯，我认为他们有这么多的天赋，有人说得很好听
我喜欢住在那里。

今天不知道怎么又被挖出来了
